title: Example: Value Iteration

definitions.Vk+1: max [sum T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γVk(s')]]

formulas: Vk+1(s) <=> max [sum T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γVk(s')]]
summary: The slide presents an example of Value Iteration in AI, showing a diagram with cars in different states and transitions between them. It includes a formula for calculating the next value iteration.
